Articles.Content:
I use Bandersnatch policemen to make the people shut up. Bandersnatchi aren't very bright so they can be turned into loyal servants by offering them good food, which I do.

MY globular cluster.
The people's cluster of globs

> 
> 
> 5 hours ago, Nailed it! said:
> 
> 
> Good luck storing Bandersnatch DNA
> 

Not Bandersnatch DNA, the DNA of the Bandersnatch Necrosis Bacillus. Still, though, I never intend to use the stuff.

HOWEVER, I do use it as leverage to get you to acknowledge the rights of "the people" and we form a democracy.
Well your population doesn't have an inpentrable, self sustaining colony.
But they have a flag! ![Kerbodyne.png](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/f/fa/Kerbodyne.png)

I'm beginning to worry that this is getting a little roleplay-ey.

Mods' thread.

> 
> 
> 6 hours ago, 0111narwhalz said:
> 
> 
> I'm beginning to worry that this is getting a little roleplay-ey.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Mods' thread.
> 

Good point, I cause the sun to Supernova therefore reseting the game.

Anyone's hill.
Hill gets sapient. Its own hill/
I become a communist government and take a way its hill from itself as government property.

I bankrupt your government in a cold war. I receive the hill in a foreclosure sale.

My hill

I put my flag on the hill.

My hill.

I burn the flag. 

My hill.

I play this song all around our planet. [https://musescore.com/user/3445651/scores/1149861](https://musescore.com/user/3445651/scores/1149861)

Our musical Planet
Yay!!! Everyone is happy!

I put my flag EX on the hill.

My hill.

Somebody covers the hill with teflon.

Noone's hill.
It is hearby dubbed "The hill of the WHOOPS!" \*boink\*

A fat man sits on it.

A fat man's hill

I nuke your hill. 

Mine.

> 
> 
> 27 minutes ago, Nailed it! said:
> 
> 
> A fat man sits on it.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> A fat man's hill
> 

> 
> 
> Just now, Lo Var Lachland said:
> 
> 
> I nuke your hill. 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Mine.
> 

Well that escalated quickly.

> 
> 
> 9 minutes ago, Lo Var Lachland said:
> 
> 
> I nuke your hill. 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Mine.
> 

My gosh that's like the third time in recent history...

Radiation kills everyone. Highly radiated animal's hills.
You all forgot that the hill was slippery! It's the "slick" animal's hill. ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif ":confused:")

I mix glue with dirt and spread the mnixture over the hill to make it not slippery.

Highly radiated and sticky animal's hills.

The glue dissolves the teflon, and the sticky substance gets frozen as a chaotic mess of sharp pikes and blades.

**Edited <time datetime="2017-02-26T17:54:31Z" title="02/26/2017 05:54  PM" data-short="7 yr">February 26, 2017</time> by kerbiloid**

I leave and build my own hill far beyond The Great Attractor.

My distant hill
